name: Myllepalli Rishwanth Kumar
my_business: We provide security Guards, housekeeping, Drivers, Data Entry Operators, Home care, Baby care and Bouncer Services for Private and Commercial Properties, and protection for Construction Companies at their construction sites. We have over twenty four(24) years experience in the Security Guard and house keeping delivery services.I am personally licensed to provide the services. Our company NEW STAR SECURITY SERVICES is an authorised and licensed by the State of TELANGANA  and ANDHRA PRADESH to provide security guard and house keeping services. We are fully insured.I bring an uncommon niche to the business with my hands on experience in security and house keeping matters and legal experience. The combination of both experiences is the customized service we offer our clients.
top_product: Security Guards, House Keeping, Bouncers, Data Entry Operators, Drivers, Event Security, Gunmen Security.
ideal_referral: Real Estate Builders & Developers, Property Management Companies, Commercial Complexes/IT Parks, Hospitals & Clinics, Hotels & Resorts, Schools/Colleges/Universities, Manufacturing & Industrial Units, Warehouses & Logistics Hubs, Event Management Companies, Gated Communities/Apartment Associations (RWAs), Government Contractors/Tender Holders.
top_problem_solved: A large apartment community in Hyderabad called us urgently. Their previous agency had stopped sending security guards and housekeeping staff, leaving the gates unmanned and the premises unclean. Residents were frustrated, and the association was under pressure. We stepped in immediately. Within hours, we assessed the site and deployed: Trained security guards Professional housekeeping staff A dedicated supervisor Complete documentation and backup support Within 48 hours, everything changed: Security was organized, cleanliness improved, complaints reduced, and the association finally had peace of mind. The President said, “You didn’t just send staff, you solved our entire problem.” And that’s what we do across AP & Telangana: we bring reliability, quality, and consistency when clients need it most.
my_favourite_bni_story: Ravi, a young financial consultant, joined BNI hoping to get a few leads. At first, he only focused on what he could gain. He attended meetings, introduced himself, but didn’t see much growth. One day, a senior member advised him: “BNI works when you stop asking for business and start giving it.” Ravi took that to heart. He began listening more carefully to members’ needs. He started actively connecting people a web designer to a restaurant owner, an accountant to a startup founder, a printer to a real estate agent. Slowly, something changed. Members started noticing his sincerity and generosity. He became known as the “Go-Giver” of the chapter. Within six months: He received over 40 referrals Built partnerships with 3 top members Increased his business revenue by 70% And gained long-lasting professional friendships Ravi realized one powerful truth: **In BNI, your success grows in proportion to the trust you build and trust comes from giving first.**
